component.name: Chart
component.description: Themed chart wrapper providing design-system-integrated colors, tooltips, and legends for Recharts visualizations.

useCases: Line charts for time-series data on dashboards
Area charts for volume or trend visualization
Pie and donut charts for proportional data
Radar and radial charts for multi-dimensional data

commonPatterns.name: bar-chart
commonPatterns.description: Basic bar chart with tooltip and legend
commonPatterns.composition:
<ChartContainer config={chartConfig}>
  <BarChart data={data}>
    <CartesianGrid vertical={false} />
    <XAxis dataKey="month" />
    <Bar dataKey="revenue" fill="var(--color-revenue)" />
    <ChartTooltip content={<ChartTooltipContent />} />
    <ChartLegend content={<ChartLegendContent />} />
  </BarChart>
</ChartContainer>

commonPatterns.name: line-chart
commonPatterns.description: Time-series line chart with themed colors
commonPatterns.composition:
<ChartContainer config={chartConfig}>
  <LineChart data={data}>
    <CartesianGrid vertical={false} />
    <XAxis dataKey="date" />
    <Line type="monotone" dataKey="visitors" stroke="var(--color-visitors)" />
    <ChartTooltip content={<ChartTooltipContent />} />
  </LineChart>
</ChartContainer>

commonPatterns.name: chart-config-definition
commonPatterns.description: Defining a ChartConfig with labels and theme-aware colors

antiPatterns.reason: Bypasses design system color theming, tooltip styling, and responsive container
antiPatterns.alternative: Always wrap Recharts components in ChartContainer with a config

antiPatterns.reason: Breaks dark mode and design system consistency
antiPatterns.alternative: Use ChartConfig with color or theme properties and reference via var(--color-key)

antiPatterns.scenario: Using default Recharts Tooltip without ChartTooltipContent
antiPatterns.reason: Default tooltip does not match design system styling

slots.children: Any Recharts chart component (BarChart, LineChart, AreaChart, PieChart, etc.)
slots.tooltip: ChartTooltip with ChartTooltipContent for themed tooltips
slots.legend: ChartLegend with ChartLegendContent for themed legends

parentConstraints: ChartContainer must receive a config prop defining data series labels and colors
Recharts chart components must be direct children of ChartContainer

interactions.hover: Tooltip appears showing data values for the hovered data point
interactions.legend: Legend items display color swatches and labels for each data series

responsive.mobile: ResponsiveContainer scales chart to fit parent width; aspect-video ratio by default
responsive.desktop: ResponsiveContainer scales chart to fit parent width; aspect-video ratio by default

accessibility.role: Decorative data visualization; relies on surrounding text for screen reader context
accessibility.keyboardSupport: Recharts internal keyboard navigation for tooltips
accessibility.screenReader: Provide a text summary or data table alongside charts for accessibility
accessibility.focusManagement: Outline hidden on chart surfaces and sectors

rules: Always use ChartContainer as the wrapper for any Recharts visualization
Define all data series in a ChartConfig object with label and color/theme properties
Reference colors via var(--color-key) where key matches the ChartConfig property name
ChartConfig supports per-theme colors via the theme property: { light: string, dark: string }
ChartTooltipContent supports indicator styles: dot (default), line, and dashed
ChartTooltipContent supports hideLabel, hideIndicator, nameKey, labelKey, and custom formatter
ChartLegendContent supports hideIcon and nameKey props
ChartContainer renders a ResponsiveContainer internally; aspect-video ratio by default via className

aiHints.context: Use as the design-system integration layer for Recharts. ChartContainer provides theme-aware CSS custom properties for colors, and ChartTooltipContent/ChartLegendContent provide styled overlays. Always define a ChartConfig and wrap charts in ChartContainer. Place charts inside Card components for dashboard layouts.
